===> 134/1/jo-37.pl <===
# Seeded srand with seed '20220227' from local date.
ok 1 - first five decimal pandigital numbers
ok 2 - first binary pandigital numbers
ok 3 - smallest five-digit ternary pandigital number
ok 4 - smallest hexatrigesimal pandigital number, see Wiki
ok 5 - largest non-redundant octal pandigital number
ok 6 - all tuples
ok 7 - all permutations
ok 8 - too many required items
ok 9 - three of two
1..9
